Content:: Neroberg is a hill in Wiesbaden in Hesse, Germany. It offers a panoramic view of the city and is therefore a tourist destination, reached by the historic Nerobergbahn, a funicular railway from the Nerotalanlagen. Nerobergbahn Tower of a former hotel Lion on the viewing platform Griechische Kapelle Monopteros Coordinates: 50°05′55″N 8°13′50″E﻿ / ﻿50.09861°N 8.23056°E﻿ / 50.09861; 8.23056 This Hesse location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
